jobs.title: Front End Engineer
bullets: Architecting a design system of color and typography variables, iconography, mixins, DOM structure guidelines and CSS naming conventions; inheritable across all products as a yarn or npm dependency
Creating a robust Typescript library of reusable React/Angular components with Storybook
Transitioning a monolithic legacy codebase (the JW dashboard) to the UI component system
Building a React simulated dashboard environment for fast user testing and visual QA
Created a repo of prototyping starter kits with baked-in JS and Less build tools (makes it quick + easy to spin up new feature POCs and sales demos)

Acted as lead engineer of the re-architecture and CMS migration of support.jwplayer.com (features include a Salesforce-authenticated case submission service, type-ahead search + article filtering, etc.)
Created custom settings within our headless CMS that allows non-technical contributors to write dynamic content that returns as JSON and renders as fully-styled UI elements
Maintain and update developer.jwplayer.com
Build data-driven product demos like Recommendations Preview Generator, Smart Thumbnails, Metadata Viewer, Click-to-Play Video Wall, etc.
Develop interactive data visualizations with D3
Mentor junior developers and interns

jobs.title: Co-Founder, Software Engineer
bullets: Built from the ground up, from the ideation & research phase, to design iteration & feature development, to data engineering, to coding the front end, to branding & product marketing
Work with data scientist/engineer to create API endpoints + data structure
Collaborate with product designer to develop a fully responsive mobile-first UI
Tools/stack: React, Sass/SCSS, Relay, GraphQL, Webpack, Node.js, Python, SQL, Heroku, JIRA

Translated PSDs to responsive front end code for mobile & desktop

jobs.title: Technology Marketing Associate
bullets: Managed email-driven lead generation for 20+ tech clients/month
Used A/B testing to determine best headlines, copy & layout styles
Drafted 10-15 weekly tech newsletters in Dreamweaver
Compiled and analyzed email testing data to find trends and best practices

jobs.title: Marketing Associate
bullets: Managed marketing & social media initiatives for five unique brands, including a staffing agency and a fleet management company
Drafted copy for blogs, newsletters, articles, press releases, and ads
Contributed to weekly branding campaigns, sales presentations, RFPs
Drafted copy for blogs, newsletters, articles, press releases, and ads

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
bullets: Publicized shows to local news outlets and blogs
Launched an original social media strategy and built brand profiles
Developed and distributed media kits for press night performances
Organized event details for premieres and cast parties

jobs.title: Events Intern
bullets: Planned large-scale philanthropic events hosted by professional athletes
Used social media to encourage 1,000-15,000 people to attend four major events
Recruited 100+ volunteers for each event and acted as volunteer manager

jobs.title: Level 6 Associate
bullets: Why is this still on my resume? Good question!
This job taught me everything I know about how to operate in a highly-systematized environment
It was excellent for honing a strong work ethic and communication skills
I learned how to handle tough situations with grace when the customer *definitely wasn't* always right
Their rigorous + formulated cooking patterns inadvertently prepped my brain to learn how to code
People seem to like this fact about me because I wore a silly uniform for many years
The food is dope (Shake Shack is good too, I'm not trying to start a burger culture war)
Minor in Sociology
Member of Associated Students Cultural Arts & Special Events Board
3-month, full-time program focused on full stack web development basics
